GeneName	SLC24A4 NCKX4

Function	Calcium, potassium:sodium antiporter that transports 1 Ca(2+) and 1 K(+) in exchange for 4 Na(+) (PubMed:12379639, PubMed:26631410). Controls the rapid response termination and proper regulation of adaptation in olfactory sensory neurons (OSNs) which subsequently influences how odor information is encoded and perceived (By similarity). May play a role in calcium transport during amelogenesis (PubMed:23375655, PubMed:24621671).
